includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Mary is forced into a difficult position by an unwelcome visitor, while Mrs Hughes looks to ease her worries about marrying Carson.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mary is forced into a difficult position by an unwelcome visitor, while Mrs Hughes looks to ease her worries about marrying Carson.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mary is forced into a difficult position by an unwelcome visitor, while Mrs Hughes looks to ease her worries about marrying Carson.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Choosing a reception venue creates friction between Mrs Hughes and Carson, Anna seeks medical advice and a day out goes horribly wrong very quickly for Mary.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Choosing a reception venue creates friction between Mrs Hughes and Carson, Anna seeks medical advice and a day out goes horribly wrong for Mary.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Choosing a reception venue creates friction between Mrs Hughes and Carson, Anna seeks medical advice and a day out goes horribly wrong very quickly for Mary.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 3
includedAssets.synopsis: The big day arrives for Mrs Hughes and Carson, while Edith is forced to rely on an old friend after she grows weary of her editor's constant insults.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The big day arrives for Mrs Hughes and Carson, while Edith is forced to rely on an old friend after she grows weary of her editor's constant insults.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The big day arrives for Mrs Hughes and Carson, while Edith is forced to rely on an old friend after she grows weary of her editor's constant insults.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Everyone is left shocked by the transformation of a figure from the past, while Anna and Mary head to London to deal with an emergency.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Everyone is left shocked by the transformation of a figure from the past, while Anna and Mary head to London to deal with an emergency.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Everyone is left shocked by the transformation of a figure from the past, while Anna and Mary head to London to deal with an emergency.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Violet attempts to bring the Minister of Health into the hospital dispute, but his visit is overshadowed by a sudden medical emergency.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Violet attempts to bring the Minister of Health into the hospital dispute, but his visit is overshadowed by a sudden medical emergency.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Violet attempts to bring the Minister of Health into the hospital dispute, but his visit is overshadowed by a sudden medical emergency.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 6
includedAssets.synopsis: The family open the house up to the public to raise money for charity, inadvertently exposing how little of its history some of its residents know.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The family open the house up to the public to raise money for charity, inadvertently exposing how little of its history some of its residents know.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The family open the house up to the public to raise money for charity, inadvertently exposing how little of its history some of its residents know.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Daisy and Molesley sit their exams, Mary receives a surprising invitation and the family witness a tragedy at the racetrack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Daisy and Molesley sit their exams, Mary receives a surprising invitation and the family witness a tragedy at the racetrack.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Daisy and Molesley sit their exams, Mary receives a surprising invitation and the family witness a tragedy at the racetrack.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 8
includedAssets.synopsis: An outburst threatens Bertie and Edith's relationship, while Mary makes a decision over her feelings for Henry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An outburst threatens Bertie and Edith's relationship, while Mary makes a decision over her feelings for Henry.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An outburst threatens Bertie and Edith's relationship, while Mary makes a decision over her feelings for Henry.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Violet and Cora clash over the future of the Downton hospital and Mary faces a difficult choice, while Mrs Hughes and Carson's wedding approaches. Final series of the smash-hit drama starring Hugh Bonneville, Jim Carter, Michelle Dockery, Elizabeth McGovern and Maggie Smith.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Violet and Cora clash, while Mrs Hughes and Carson's wedding approaches in the final series of the hit drama starring Hugh Bonneville and Jim Carter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Violet and Cora clash over the future of the Downton hospital and Mary faces a difficult choice, while Mrs Hughes and Carson's wedding approaches. Final series of the smash-hit drama starring Hugh Bonneville, Jim Carter, Michelle Dockery, Elizabeth McGovern and Maggie Smith.

includedIn.title: Downton Abbey
includedIn.synopsis: An aristocratic family and their servants experience tragedy and triumph against a backdrop of political and social change in early 20th century Yorkshire.

includedIn.mediumSynopsis: An aristocratic family and their servants experience tragedy and triumph against a backdrop of political and social change in early 20th century Yorkshire.
